Description: Fragment of tapestry panel, all cotton - dark blue around light blue. Design a frieze of lotus flowers with palmettes between, linked at their bases by striped U forms. At left hand end of panel design changes - for a border? A larger motif outlined in dark blue on a light blue ground.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Qasr Ibrim (Nubia), X2-2 (below) North Temple Plaza
Acquisition name: Division of Finds: Egyptian Antiquities Organisation
